testcase.name: new user could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given new user launch registration page.....................................passed And new user fills registration form with valid data........................passed When new user can register..................................................passed Then a success message is displayed.........................................passed And user logs out after registering.........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | User could use login functionality to open his account
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user can login with valid email and valid password.....................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed And logged user logs out....................................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_ResetPassword | User could reset his password
testcase.name: user reset his password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed Given user clicks on forgot password........................................passed When user enters his valid email address....................................passed And user clicks on recover button...........................................passed Then user got a Displayed Message...........................................passed And user could close the Notification Bar...................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | Logged user could search for any product on the website
testcase.name: Logged user could search by product name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed And user can login with valid email and valid password......................passed When logged user clicks on search field.....................................passed And logged user searches with name of product...............................passed Then logged user could find relative results................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_SwitchCurrency | Logged user could switch between currencies
testcase.name: Logged user could switch currency
testcase.system-out: Given user selects a product................................................passed When user changes the currency..............................................passed Then user could find the selected currency..................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_Categories | Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: Logged user could select random category then hover and open sub-Category
testcase.system-out: Given logged user can select Random Category................................passed Then logged user could hover and open sub-Category..........................passed

testcase.classname: F07_FilterColor | Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: Logged user could filter product with color
testcase.system-out: Given logged user selects Category and hover to open sub-Category...........passed When logged user can filter sub-Category with color.........................passed Then logged user could find product with the selected color.................passed

testcase.classname: F08_SelectTags | Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given logged user can select a popular tag..................................passed When logged user finds products.............................................passed Then logged user could select a different tag...............................passed And logged user finds another different products............................passed

testcase.classname: F09_CompareList | Logged user could add different products to Compare list
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Compare list
testcase.system-out: Given logged user can add First Product to Compare list.....................passed And logged user can add Second Product to Compare list......................passed And logged user can add Third Product to Compare list.......................passed When logged user navigates to Compare products list.........................passed Then logged user could compare between the selected products................passed And logged user can clear a product from list...............................passed And logged user deletes all the list........................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_Wishlist | Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given logged user selects his favorite product..............................passed When logged user adds a product to the Wishlist.............................passed And logged user adds another product to the Wishlist........................passed Then logged user navigates to his Wishlist page.............................passed

testcase.classname: F11_ShoppingCart | Logged user could add different products to Shopping Cart
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Shopping Cart
testcase.system-out: Given logged user checks all his Wishlist products..........................passed Then logged user could add his Wishlist products to Shopping Cart...........passed

testcase.classname: F12_OrderCheckout | Logged user could Create Successful Order
testcase.name: Logged user could Create Successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given logged user agrees with terms and proceed to Checkout.................passed When logged user fills out Billing address to Create Order..................passed And logged user confirms Billing address....................................passed And logged user selects Shipping Method to Continue.........................passed And logged user selects Payment Method to Continue..........................passed When logged user fills out Payment Information..............................passed Then logged user could confirm his order....................................passed And logged user can check order details.....................................passed And logged user could save invoice..........................................passed And logged user could print invoice.........................................passed
